entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Professor Lockhart is a wizard who taught Harry and Ron a spell that went wrong. He is described as 'weedy' and is being held at wandpoint by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who caught Lockhart's wand and is now holding him at wandpoint. He seems to be in charge of the situation.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape taught Harry and Ron a spell that went wrong, which led to this situation with Lockhart.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is sitting on the cistern of the end toilet in the bathroom. She seems to be a presence in the scene but does not interact with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: chamber of secrets
entities.description: The Chamber of Secrets is where Harry and Ron think they know it is located. They are trying to find out what's inside it.

relationships.description: Harry is holding Lockhart at wandpoint, forcing him to his feet. This shows that Harry has control over the situation.
Harry and Ron are trying to find out where the Chamber of Secrets is located, which suggests they have a goal or mission in mind.
